result.title: Stakeholder board completed and ready to receive updates (mailing list created)
result.description: A detailed list of stakeholder (related to the project innovation and to all connected results) will be created, and a communication strategy will be implemented. These organisation will receive our updates on a regualar basis (please refer to the deliverable 8.7). Of utmost importance are the National Regulatory Agencies, the European Medicine Agency and the Food and Drug Administration)
